name: First Post
body:
### Welcome to My GitHub Pages.
Welcome all, This is my first blog post. I have signed up myself to #dgplug summer training. Unlike most of the students attending this course, I am not a student. I am a working professional, working as a support engineer. I would like to tickle my coding instincts and thankfully I landed into dgplug's summer training. Folks at this summer training are doing a great job in educating folks about the need of opensource and the need to contribute towards it. 
I hope I keep myself commited for this training session and hopefully one day I contribute to opensource projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
